stories.text:
You can download and review 5 free versions of the product I launched.

After recording our podcasts, we sometimes struggle for a long time between unfamiliar programs and meaningless designs.

After recording podcasts, we sometimes struggle between designing graphics and choosing our own layout and design of the podcast. We also have a hard time figuring out what software to use and how best to apply designs to the content.

A Podcaster should be only concerned with is the quality of the content, not the Cover design of the Podcast. That's why I prepared a Podcast Cover Template that everyone can use easily. You can start using it by choosing a design that will best suit your podcast, uploading the image you want and adjusting each color if desired.

Bonus â™¥ I will send you 5 free podcast cover templates at the beginning of the following week to anyone who buys this before the special offer ends or as a free download to anyone who downloaded it before then.

How To Use Video https://youtu.be/K1SDKNUQfxA

https://www.producthunt.com/posts/podcast-cover-template
